Slate Editor Demo

Slate is a completely customizable framework for building rich text editors. Unlike other editors, Slate lets you build complex, nested documents with custom elements.

Why Slate?

Slate was created because existing solutions had limitations:

  • Customizable - The core is plugin-based, making it easy to customize
  • Schema-less - Define your own document structure
  • Nested blocks - Support for complex nested content
  • Parallel to the DOM - Built on React and Immer

Rich Text Features

With Slate you can create editors with all the formatting options you need:

  1. Bold, italic, and underlined text
  2. Strikethrough and code formatting
  3. Superscriptsuper and subscriptsub

"Slate is designed from the ground up to be intuitive to use, and intuitive to understand."

Getting Started

npm install slate slate-react

Read the documentation to learn more.
